title: SM-02.02 — Decay & Recompute Cycle (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)

[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController] --> TRIGGER : CronTick / RecomputeRequested / ParamsVersioned
note right of TRIGGER
  Entry conditions:
  • Scheduled batch tick (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
  • Manual backfill (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
  • Parameters changed (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
end note

TRIGGER --> LOAD_SNAPSHOT : Select ledger window
note right of LOAD_SNAPSHOT
  Load CPᵢ(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController) snapshots and pending deltas
  Resolve idempotent ranges and gaps
end note

LOAD_SNAPSHOT --> CHECK_PARAMS : Bind constants (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
note right of CHECK_PARAMS
  λ = ln(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)/T  (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
  α ∈ (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)    (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
  If new version → tag run with ParamVersionID
end note

CHECK_PARAMS --> APPLY_DECAY : InputBound
note right of APPLY_DECAY
  Apply time decay to each CPᵢ since t₀:
  CPᵢ(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode) = CPᵢ(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) · e^(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) + Σ(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
end note

APPLY_DECAY --> RECOMPUTE_W : DecayApplied (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
note right of RECOMPUTE_W
  Recompute voting weights:
  Wᵢ = (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)^α
  Prepare diffs for persistence & metrics
end note

RECOMPUTE_W --> WRITE_BACK : WeightsComputed
note right of WRITE_BACK
  Persist CP/W snapshots + audit trail
  Mark run as deterministic (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
end note

WRITE_BACK --> EMIT_EVENTS : LedgerCommitted
note right of EMIT_EVENTS
  Emit CPUpdated / WeightsUpdated for Metrics (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
  Optionally trigger Resonance recompute (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
end note

EMIT_EVENTS --> [IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode] : RecomputeFinished (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)

%% ---- Exceptional & maintenance paths ----
LOAD_SNAPSHOT --> RECONCILE : GapDetected / CorrectionInput
note right of RECONCILE
  Backfill missing windows, reconcile oracles
  (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
end note
RECONCILE --> APPLY_DECAY : Reconciled

APPLY_DECAY --> ABORT : InvariantBreach / AnomalyDetected
RECOMPUTE_W --> ABORT : InvariantBreach
ABORT --> [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream] : RecomputeAborted
